arts.ttl: Five key takeaways as Messi’s Inter Miami draws with Al Ahly in Club World Cup opener
arts.sum: The 27-year-old Egyptian attacking midfielder had a season full of impressive stats, driving the African Red Devils forward, but in the opening match of the Club World Cup, he had to be substituted due to issues with his left shoulder. Although not the ideal result for Javier Mascherano’s team, this draw leaves Miami firmly in the hunt to reach the next round, ahead of their remaining group games against Porto and Palmeiras.

arts.ttl: Inter Miami 0-0 Al Ahly: Player Ratings as Club World Cup Starts With Scoreless Draw
arts.sum: The pivotal moment of the game came in the 43rd minute, when Ustari made a diving save on a penalty kick against Egypt’s leading man, Trézéguet, to keep the match level and allow Lionel Messi and teammates to push ahead to late chances in the second half. Meanwhile, his Al Ahly counterpart, Mohamed El Shenawy, made five saves, including two late stops on curling shots from Messi late in the second half.

arts.ttl: Inter Miami, Al Ahly open Club World Club with stalemate -- but FIFA will be happy
arts.sum: The new era of the Club World Cup began on Saturday with a tense draw between Inter Miami and Al Ahly. It wasn't pretty, but tournament organisers will no doubt be satisfied.

arts.ttl: Al Ahly 0-0 Inter Miami: Lionel Messi denied injury time winner as Club World Cup begins with goalless draw
arts.sum: Both sides created clear cut chances in an entertaining goalless draw

arts.ttl: Al Ahly v Inter Miami: Club World Cup 2025 opening match – live updates
arts.sum: MLS side host Egyptian champions in Club World Cup Explainer: all your Club World Cup questions answered Reach Beau at beau.dure.freelance@theguardian.com The Al Ahly side are overwhelmingly domestic. A few players from Morocco dot the roster, and they have Slovenian Nejc Gradišar on the bench. One familiar name is Trézéguet – no, not David. It’s actually a Brazilian-style nickname for an Egyptian player Mahmoud Ahmed Ibrahim Hassan. He spent a few years with Aston Villa before a spell in Turkey and a return back to the club with which he started. Continue reading...

arts.ttl: Al Ahly vs Inter Miami LIVE: Club World Cup match stream, latest team news, lineups, TV, prediction
arts.sum: Lionel Messi aims to get Inter Miami's Club World Cup campaign off to a flying start

arts.ttl: Al Ahly vs Inter Miami: What time does Messi play and where to watch the FIFA Club World Cup opener
arts.sum: African giants Al Ahly will take on Inter Miami, the team that will make its debut in the competition led by Argentine star Lionel Messi, in what will be the opening match of the tournament. All confederations have participation in the Club World Cup where UEFA (Europe) has 12 teams; CONMEBOL (South America) has six, while Africa, Asia and Concacaf had four places; one more for Oceania and finally MLS had an additional place as the host country.

arts.ttl: Al Ahly vs. Inter Miami CF: Preview, Predictions and Lineups
arts.sum: Egyptian giants Al Ahly and Major League Soccer’s Inter Miami will lock horns in the opening match of the 2025 FIFA Club World Cup on Saturday evening. They head into the clash with Al Ahly off the back of two thumping MLS victories, but their underwhelming defensive record means they have lost five of their last 10 matches in all competitions.

arts.ttl: How to watch Al Ahly vs Inter Miami: TV channel and live stream for Club World Cup today
arts.sum: A first-ever meeting between the two teams kicks-off the revamped Club World Cup tournament

arts.ttl: Inter Miami suffer injury blow ahead of Club World Cup opener
arts.sum: Inter Miami head coach Javier Mascherano confirms a major injury blow ahead of the Club World Cup opener against Al Ahly.
